item.title: [GRA/RBX/SBG/BHS][Collaborative solutions] - Exchange Hosted and Private search feature
item.description:
May 15, 08:34 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 14/03/2024 14:00 UTC
End time : 14/05/2024 11:00 UTC
Root cause : Incident due to a software issue.
Our technical teams have implemented patches to resolve the problem. All impacted services are now operational.

May 14, 12:55 UTC
Update - Our technicians have finished applying the pacth to the private servers. The shared infrastructure is still being patched, but no service interruption is expected.

May 10, 20:05 UTC
Update - Our technicians apply the patch to the servers gradually and there is a maximum outage of 45 minutes per server.

May 7, 21:28 UTC
Update - Our technicians apply the patch to the servers gradually and there is a maximum outage of 45 minutes per server.

Apr 30, 07:55 UTC
Update - We are testing the exchange patch and industrializing the deployment. Status page will be updated when scheduling of patch deployment will be performed.

Apr 10, 15:22 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Mar 19, 14:41 UTC
Update - Our technical teams are working with our partner to solve the issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Mar 15, 09:11 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Mar 14, 14:14 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 14/03/2024 14:00 UTC
Service impact : Microsoft Outlook product is facing an issue that prevent clients to perform a search. Application like OWA, ActiveSync are working without impact. We are investingating with Microsoft to identify the root cause of this issue.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Workaround : Temporary you can disable the ServerAssistedSearch by creating registry key base on the schema bellow.

• Key: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Office\16.0\Outlook\Search
• Value name: DisableServerAssistedSearch
• Value type: REG_DWORD
• Value: 1

Please remember that altering registry key require creation of backup and done incorrectly can damage your computer.

Thank you for your trust. Security and protection of your data remain our highest priority, and it is in this frame of mind that we have been operating for years.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Collaborative solutions] - Outlook Web (OWA)
item.description:
May 15, 08:31 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 13/03/2024 00:00 UTC
End time : 14/05/2024 11:00 UTC
Root cause : Incident due to a software issue.
Our technical teams have implemented patches to resolve the problem. All impacted services are now operational.

Apr 10, 15:03 UTC
Update - To work around this issue, download the document, and then use the Microsoft Office desktop applications to view or edit it.
We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Mar 25, 10:14 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Mar 25, 09:56 UTC
Identified - Start time : 13/03/2024 00:00 UTC
Service impact : Following an mandatory update from Microsoft, adding templates to Exchange-based services and previewing Excel or Word documents is temporarily not functioning on OWA (Outlook on the web). Links for shared calendars is temporarily not functioning.
Root cause : Software issue
Ongoing actions : We are working with Microsoft to fix this issue.
Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [SPAIN][VOIP] - Receiving phone calls
item.description:
May 14, 12:48 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 13/05/2024 02:26 UTC
Start time : 13/05/2024 20:37 UTC
Root cause : Incident due to a connectivity issue on our infrastructure.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

May 14, 07:21 UTC
Monitoring - Update : Our teams have fixed a connectivity issue on our infrastructure. All calls completed successfully.
Our teams are keeping the incident under surveillance throughout the morning.

May 13, 08:41 UTC
Identified - Investigations in progress with our remote spanish provider.

May 13, 08:40 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 13/05/2024 02:26 UTC
Service impact : Our spanish subscribers can make calls but they can not receive calls.
Ongoing actions : Investigations in progress with our remote spanish provider
